trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty class represents a schema property definition that is contained in the schema partition.
trans-unit.target: La classe ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty rappresenta una definizione di proprietà dello schema contenuta nella partizione dello schema.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> object that was created to the Active Directory Domain Services.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo deve essere chiamato per eseguire il commit di <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty>oggetto creato in servizi di dominio Active Directory.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> oggetto che specifica il contesto per questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the LDAP display name for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il nome visualizzato LDAP per questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: context does not refer to a valid or , or ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: contextnon fa riferimento a un oggetto valido o , o ldapDisplayName è una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: context or ldapDisplayName is .
trans-unit.target: contextor ldapDisplayName is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome comune (CN) del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che ottiene o imposta il CN del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una descrizione di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that gets or sets a description of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che ottiene o imposta una descrizione dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse utilizzate da di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite utilizzate da di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto e, facoltativamente, rilascia le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the managed resources should be released; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le risorse gestite devono essere rilasciate. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se le risorse non gestite devono essere rilasciate solo.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto nella partizione dello schema di servizi di dominio Active Directory che corrisponde a un contesto di directory e nome.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> oggetto che specifica il contesto per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema property to search for.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.String>che specifica il nome della proprietà dello schema da cercare. LDAP</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object for the schema property that is found.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto per la proprietà dello schema che viene trovata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property is not found.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Se la proprietà non viene trovata.

trans-unit.source: The object was not found.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto non è stato trovato.

trans-unit.source: context does not refer to a valid or , or ldapDisplayName parameter is an empty string.

trans-unit.target: contextor ldapDisplayName is .

trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto è inattivo.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Boolean>valore che indica se l'oggetto di proprietà dello schema corrente è inattivo.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is defunct; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes to the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il commit di tutte le modifiche apportate all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto nell'archivio directory sottostante.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schemaIDGuid for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore schemaIDGuid per il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [Schema-ID-GUID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere l'argomento [GUID dell'ID dello Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The SchemaGuid is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
trans-unit.target: Il SchemaGuid viene utilizzato in molte operazioni di configurazione di servizi di dominio Active Directory, ad esempio la gestione dei diritti estesi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that represents the schemaIDGuid for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Guid>che rappresenta il valore schemaIDGuid per il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [Schema-ID-GUID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere l'argomento [GUID dell'ID dello Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_schemaidguid.asp) in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"></xref> object indicating the property type (syntax) of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"> </xref> che indica il tipo di proprietà (sintassi) dell'oggetto di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"></xref> object that defines the property type of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"> </xref> oggetto che definisce il tipo di proprietà di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata al servizio directory sottostante ha restituito un errore.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Il server di destinazione è occupato o non disponibile.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not a valid <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"></xref> value (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: Il tipo specificato non è valido <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySyntax"> </xref> valore (si applica solo all'insieme).

trans-unit.source: Gets the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome visualizzato LDAP del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il nome visualizzato LDAP del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.String>
